meanings.sent1: The women in the office are hardworking and dedicated.
meanings.sent2: Many women enjoy reading books in their free time.
meanings.sent3: The women at the party all wore colorful hats and danced joyfully.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the trees swayed gently as the women walked by.
meanings.sent5: The women's laughter filled the room with warmth and happiness.

meanings.definition: The female members of a community, group, or species.
meanings.sent1: The women in the choir sang beautifully together.
meanings.sent2: The women of the village gathered to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent3: The women in the garden chatted with the flowers and birds.
meanings.sent4: The women of the pack protected their young with fierce determination.
meanings.sent5: The women of the team celebrated their victory with cheers and high-fives.
